channel.title: Ban Commands and a New Shop
channel.description:
alrightyyy, I need it so that, when you right-click on the person, there is a Kick (user) and Ban (user) option. Also, I need to know how to ip-ban and Unban People. I accidently banned an innocent person.
ALSO, how do I add a santa that sells rares? Thanks.
NOTE: I'm pretty much a noob coder atm, so, try to be as specific as possible, thanks :)[br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2007, 07:38:04 PM[/size][hr]ALSO, if someone could tell me how to make some kind of admin armour (that gives a large amount of str bonus) that would be nice ;)
One more thing, if you know how to make phats/rares add strength bonus, i would love you forever :)

item.title: Ban Commands and a New Shop
item.dc:creator: @i_ancients_i i ancients i
item.description:
@i_ancients_i wrote:

hey wild, might wanna update ur siggy to like advertise ur server not someone elses lol, but anyways if u want to add an item to shops open up ur shops.cfg and edit it into the shop you want, you can add the item by changing the id…and add more of the amount…it’s pretty easy tell me if i helped xD and im a nooby coder myself heh
